attributes.title: This is horrifying
attributes.review: I don’t even like trump 🚫❌, but I thought I’d give his app a try. Let me tell you BIGGEST MISTAKE 🙅🏻‍♀️as soon as I downloaded it, they told me to vote for him. I mean i don’t live in America but the 4 years he’s been president of America 🇺🇸 it’s been chaos 💥 OH AND FREE BARREN TRUMP poor boi 👶🏻🥺

attributes.title: Trump 2020
attributes.review: I got the app to be forever loyal to the country, and to support my president. My superhero. My daddy. But once I opened the app, immediately a wall popped up and it locked me out. Now I am kicked out of the app, and I couldn’t even donate yet. Oh yea and I’m a immigrant.

attributes.title: Trump 2020
attributes.review: Great informative way to get an inside look at the great campaign for freedom that ever was!!

attributes.title: HORRIBLE DONT GET!
attributes.review: Unlike other reviews, mine is real. This app is very hard to use, it glitches often, gave my phone a virus, and is overall- one of the worst apps on the app store. PLEASE take it off ASAP to save someone else time!

attributes.title: TERRIBLE
attributes.review: 🧚🧚‍♀️like many other people I was trying to find the orange foundation that Donald J Trump uses on his face daily and the wig that he uses daily but when I was searched it up on the app I could not find any results! I am a very angry customer!!😡🧚‍♀️🧚

attributes.title: dear donald JeNiUs trump
attributes.review: wow where do i even start.....this app is truly amazing everything about it is amazing i just really love how there’s a whole app to get a racist and a rapist into the office again!!!! really great for our country huh??! n e ways trump 2020!!!! 🧚🏻‍♀️✨ but on a headstone 💕🥰🌈

attributes.title: I- am shook
attributes.review: I am utterly disgusted and disappointed that people actually got this horrible app, me and my husband were shocked from the outcome of this app. We believed in you Donald why😭😭😭. Well it’s time for me to move on you feel me 🏃🏽‍♀️🏃🏽‍♀️

attributes.title: Disgusting
attributes.review: I was looking for some non racist items, but the WHOLE app was filled with racist bs     👁👄👁 DISAPPOINTED but NOT IMPRESSED! Not only that, I wasn’t able to find Trump’s famous wig, I looked all over the app and found nothing! Do better next time!

attributes.title: DISCUSTING
attributes.review: i wanted to support my amazing president, mr. Cheeto😡 but as l was downloading it i got a text from my boyfriend that said he wanted to break up. then when i downloaded it i got a nasty case of diarrhea and had to go to the bathroom.😵 overall a very bad app❌ trump 2020🌸💫🧚🏼‍♂️💕 in the ground💕🌸🧚🏼‍♂️💫🍭

attributes.title: where’s my dad?
attributes.review: I was simply asking Donald the idiot here where my father went thinking he would know because he’s the “president” and all that and he had the audacity to reply with “ Sorry, you cannot respond to this message.” which is TOTALLY INSENSITIVE anyways F DONALD TRUMP ACAB and 😌goodnight
